canonical_transcript: hey i am ray from mintra here to assist you shall we proceed further in hindi or english great how can i help you today could you please tell me the product name or brand for which youd like to check the delivery date please give me a moment to fetch your products your stailkast ex revolt men opaque casual shirt is being processed and will be delivered by 21 august please tell me is there anything else i can help you with sure how else can i assist you today your previous request about the delivery date has been addressed could you please tell me what youd like assistance with next no problem let me repeat that for you your stailkast ex revolt men opaque casual shirt is scheduled for delivery by 21 august let me know if you need any further assistance im sorry we are currently unable to accommodate changes to the delivery date is there anything else i can assist you with i noticed youve been quiet are you still there alright please let me know how else i can once your item is out for delivery the delivery partner will call you when they are near your location is there anything else i can assist you with to change the size of your product youll need to initiate an exchange request you can do this in the mintra app by going to the orders section selecting the item and choosing exchange let me know if you need help with the process or anything else you can easily do this online through the mintra app simply open the app go to the orders section select the currently exchanges can only be initiated through the mintra app or website i recommend opening the app navigating to the orders section i can help you track your orders assist with delivery related queries and provide information about returns or exchanges let me know what specific help you need well be sending you a quick feedback form via sms your input would really help us improve thank you for choosing mintra have a great day
